basics.name: Sugra Baghirova
basics.summary: Data Analyst, with tech startup experience, website and software management expertise, combined with 5+ years of experience in sales and digital marketing. Skilled in Python, Pandas, SQL, and data visualization tools such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, R and D3.js. In a short period of time, I was able to learn multiple front- and back-end computer programming languages and developed multiple research and analysis project websites and custom-built data scraping tools.

education.institution: International Prague University, Prague, Czech Republic

highlights: Currently working remote for an IT service provider based in Canada to help manage Alert Software and their IT projects. My responsibilities include adding employee’s work timesheet to the system, signing tasks for each of team member, making sure tasks has been completed, creating invoices in Alert Software and importing them to the QuickBooks. Tracking the BMC remedy action request system - for availability of new CRQ, TAS, INC.

work.position: Traffic Coordinator / Data Coordinator / ERP assistant / Website Manager
highlights: Joined the team as a Traffic Coordinator and grew to become the Product Specialist for our biggest client “Diamond CBD” It was my job to communicate with manufacturing while client managing data and updating products to coordinate with designers for design and digital rendering of products. I was also creating and controlling SKU, UPCs and QR codes for labels. As a product specialist I start to work with their ERP system in the “Odoo”. I published products and updates to the website while managing the wholesale inventory and retail system. I also optimized client’s sites for SEO, making sure Meta titles and meta descriptions were attached for all products, pages, articles and images.

Greeted customers and promptly answered questions to maximize service opportunity. Handled bookkeeping and kept financial records up-to-date. Composed and posted online content on the company’s website and different social media accounts (e.g. Instagram, Facebook). Maintained accuracy in calculating discounts, interest and employee commissions. I successfully implemented new technologies and process automations to encourage continuous improvement. Composed effective accounting reports summarizing accounts payable data. Managed payment collections and billing. Researched and resolved accounts payable discrepancies. Created daily and weekly cash reports for accounting and management. Reviewed all expense reports for accuracy and proper expense disclosure.

Built and launched a range of products for the international market. Managed diverse department offices. Built the seasonal collection and helped plan the permanent range of products. Provided analysis of the current sales collections and consumer preferences. Assisted head buyer on business trips, tradeshows and showrooms during several fashion weeks. Negotiated with suppliers and manufacturers.
